metadata.dc:author: Mayayo Artal, E
Sánchez Herrera, S
Razquin Lizarraga, S
Anton Valenti, E
metadata.dc:description: We report two cases of bilharziasis of the bladder in immigrants who presented with spontaneous hematuria. This condition was diagnosed by urine cytology. The current tide of immigration and tourism have led to an increased number of diseases acquired abroad. A simple, economic and rapid method for diagnosing schistosomiasis in patients at risk with hematuria is described.
metadata.dc:title: Esquistosomiasis (Bilharziosis). Importancia de la citología. A propósito de dos casos.
[Schistosomiasis (bilharziosis). Importance of cytology. Report of 2 cases].
